name: remult-mono-repo
description: See projects/core for the remult core package.json. This package.json is used for remult/core development, test projects and experimental work. See

scripts.test: concurrently -k -n "TSC,Test" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "tsc -w -p projects/core/tsconfig.build.json --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir misc/dts-compare" "cd projects/test-angular && ng test core"
scripts.release-core: npm run build-core && npm run patch-versions
scripts.release-core-experimental: npm run build-core && npm run patch-versions-experimental && cd dist/remult && npm publish  --access public --tag exp
scripts.build-core: tsc -p projects/core/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p projects/core/tsconfig.build.esm.json && copyfiles -u 2 projects/core/package.json dist/remult && copyfiles README.md dist/remult && copyfiles LICENSE dist/remult
scripts.build: npm run build-core && npm run remult-angular-build
scripts.all-servers: concurrently -k -n "koa,fastify,express,mw,deno-fresh,mwc,next,svelteKit,next-app" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgYellow.bold" "ts-node-dev -P projects/test-angular/tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/koaServer.ts" "npm run fastify-server" "ts-node-dev -P projects/test-angular/tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/expressServer.ts" "ts-node-dev -P projects/test-angular/tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/middlewareServer.ts" "cd projects/test-servers/deno-fresh && deno task start" "ts-node-dev -P projects/test-angular/tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/middlewareCore.ts" "cd projects/test-servers/next-server && npm run dev" "cd projects/test-servers/sveltekit-server && npm run dev" "cd projects/test-servers/next-app-server && npm run dev"
scripts.publish-as-next: npm run build && npm run patch-versions && cd dist/remult && npm publish  --access public --tag next && cd.. && cd angular && npm publish  --access public --tag next
scripts.test:ci: cd projects/test-angular && ng test core --code-coverage && npm run test-vitest
scripts.patch-versions-experimental: FOR /F %i in ('npm version prerelease -preid "exp" -m "release %s"') DO git push origin %i && npm run update-versions
scripts.patch-versions: FOR /F %i in ('npm version patch -m "release %s"') DO git push origin %i && npm run update-versions
scripts.remult-angular-build: copyfiles -V  -a projects/angular/** dist/build-angular && copyfiles -V dist/build-angular/projects/angular/angular.json dist/build-angular -u 4 && copyfiles -V tsconfig.json dist/build-angular && copyfiles -V -u 1 dist/remult/** dist/build-angular/node_modules && cd dist/build-angular &&  ng build angular && cd.. && cd.. &&  npm run copy:styles
